articles.title: Blinken and China's top diplomat spar over spy balloon incident in Munich meeting - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Wang Yi slams the United States' "excessive use of force" while Blinken warns such surveillance "must never again occur."
articles.content: We are very concerned that China is considering providing lethal support to Russia in its aggression against Ukraine and I made clear that that would have serious consequences in our relationship, Bl… [+2437 chars]
